content:
That sounds like a great plan! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to share your Japanese-inspired appetizers with your guests. The combination of modern labels, food flags, and place cards will add a nice touch of elegance and whimsy to your presentation.

I'm also excited for you to experience the pairing of your appetizers with the Junmai sake. The crisp, refreshing flavors of the sake will complement the delicate flavors of your dishes beautifully. The umami notes in the sake will enhance the savory flavors of the yakitori, while the fruit notes will complement the sweetness of the edamame and gyoza.

Remember to encourage your guests to take small sips of the sake between bites to fully appreciate the pairing. And don't hesitate to ask for feedback or suggestions – it's all part of the fun of sharing food and drink with others!

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you and your guests have a wonderful time enjoying your Japanese-inspired dinner party! Kanpai!
